flawed_nl_solution:
Four of the five figures are worth 4 * 15 = $<<4*15=60>>60.
With one more expensive figure, they are all worth 60 + 20 = $<<60+20=80>>80.
On all action figures, Jimmy will lose 5 * 5 = $<<5*5=25>>25 if he sells them cheaper.
So if Jimmy sells the figures he will get 80 - 25 = $<<80-25=58>>58.
#### 58

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 55, not 58. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
